name: BeanstalkDeployApplication
description: Deploys an application to Amazon EC2 instance(s) using AWS Beanstalk.
author: Amazon Web Services

inputs.name: awsCredentials
inputs.label: AWS Credentials
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the AWS credentials to use. If needed, click on 'manage', and add a new Service Endpoint of type 'AWSCredentials'

inputs.name: webDeploymentAchive
inputs.label: Web Deploy Archive
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to web deploy archive that contains the application to deploy to Elastic Beanstalk.

inputs.name: applicationName
inputs.label: Beanstalk Application Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the AWS Beanstalk application

inputs.name: environmentName
inputs.label: Elastic Beanstalk Environment Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Elastic Beanstalk environment that will run the application

messages.DeterminedBucket: Determine S3 bucket %s to store application bundle
messages.UploadingBundle: Uploading application bundle '%s' to object '%s' in bucket '%s'
messages.BundleUploadFailed: Upload of application bundle failed with error: %s
messages.FailedToFindEnvironment: Failed to find environment when waiting for deployment completion
